Directions: Combine 2 cups cranberry juice and crushed pineapple. Pour into a 6-cup ring mold; freeze. Just before serving, combine pineapple juice and remaining cranberry juice in a punch bowl; stir in ginger ale.  Add the ice ring.
Ingredients: 1 (64 fluid ounce) bottle cranberry juice, chilled, divided
1 (46 fluid ounce) can pineapple juice, chilled
